nodes.text: The Selruvian biome was the name of sector 8022 of the artificial world designated Iokath. In 3630 BBY, ARIES trapped the Alliance leadership on Iokath, placing the Alliance Commander and Torian Cadera inside the Selruvian biome.
Selruvian biome appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Eternal Throne "Chapter IV: Where Dreams Die".
